title: scNODE
description: Generative Model  that integrates a variational autoencoder (VAE) with neural ordinary differential equations (ODEs) to predict gene expression in a continuous and non-linear latent space

title: One-Versus-Others Attention
description: A new domain-neutral attention mechanism, One-Versus-Others (OvO) attention, that scales linearly with the number of modalities and requires only n attention operations, thus offering a significant reduction in computational complexity compared to existing cross-modal attention algorithms
